TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi StartupNextInstanceEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生的单实例应用程序的后续实例启动时，使用 Visual Basic 应用程序模型。The event occurs when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application starts, using the Visual Basic Application Model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 包含在后续的应用程序实例的命令行参数，指示第一个应用程序实例是否应转到在退出异常处理程序时的前景。 contains the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance and indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<string> args, bool bringToForegroundFlag) cil managed
Public Sub New (args As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String), bringToForegroundFlag As Boolean)

param.name: args
param.span: 一个 对象，包含后续应用程序实例的命令行参数。

span.span: A object that contains the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance.

param.name: bringToForegroundFlag
param.span: 一个 ，指示第一个应用程序实例是否应在退出异常处理程序时进入前台。

span.span: A that indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生的单实例应用程序的后续实例启动时，使用 Visual Basic 应用程序模型。The event occurs when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application starts, using the Visual Basic Application Model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 包含在后续的应用程序实例的命令行参数，指示第一个应用程序实例是否应转到在退出异常处理程序时的前景。 contains the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance and indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BringToForeground { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指示第一个应用程序实例是否应在退出异常处理程序时进入前台。

span.span: Indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.

value.span: 一个 ，指示第一个应用程序实例是否应在退出异常处理程序时进入前台。

span.span: A that indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Basic 应用程序模型在运行的处理程序之后会检查此属性的值事件。The Visual Basic Application Model checks the value of this property after running the handlers of the event. 如果属性是`True`，第一个应用程序实例置于前台。If the property is `True`, the first application instance is brought to the foreground. 否则，第一个应用程序实例保留原位。Otherwise, the first application instance remains where it was. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandLine As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

summary.span: 获取后续应用程序实例的命令行参数。

span.span: Gets the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含后续应用程序实例的命令行参数。

span.span: A object that contains the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生的单实例应用程序的后续实例启动时，使用 Visual Basic 应用程序模型。The event occurs when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application starts, using the Visual Basic Application Model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).
